description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows Routing and Remote Access Service (RRAS) remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-30014):

1. Download and install the appropriate KB updates based on your Windows version and build.
   - For Windows 10 systems, apply KB5037788.
   - For Windows 11 systems, apply KB5037771, KB5037770, or KB5037768 based on your specific version and architecture.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the updates are applied correctly.

**Details**:
The updates address a critical flaw due to a numeric truncation error that could allow remote code execution. Ensure your system is updated to mitigate exploitation risks. For manual installation, download the respective update packages from the links provided:
- [KB5037788](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037788)
- [KB5037771](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037771)
- [KB5037770](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037770)
- [KB5037768](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5037768)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure you have the correct product version and architecture before applying the updates.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
